column2: Clean Harbors, Inc. engages in the provision of environmental, energy, and industrial services. The company is headquartered in Norwell, Massachusetts and currently employs 14,200 full-time employees. The firm is also a re-refiner and recycler of used oil in the world and a provider of parts cleaning and related environmental services to commercial, industrial and automotive customers in North America. The firm operates in six segments: Technical Services, Industrial Services, Field Services, Safety-Kleen, Oil and Gas Field Services, and Lodging Services. The firm is also a service provider in the recovery and decontamination of pollutants. The firm provides services to protect the ozone layer from the effects of chlorofluorocarbons (CFCs). The company offers brands, such as Performance Plus brand and green brand EcoPower. The firm also offers CleanPack services, which include the collection, identification and categorization, packaging, transportation and disposal of laboratory chemicals and household hazardous waste. The company also provides hydro excavation services.
